issue.title: [C++] Clean up documentation of filesystem interface
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16101](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16101). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `arrow::fs::FileSystem` interface is partially documented but it is missing docstrings and has some comments like "same as above" which cause the resulting documentation to be a bit harder to read.

We should go through and make a pass at cleaning this up.
